page.title: 14FESTIVALS IN INKBERROW.
page.content: Lots of things happen every year in Inkberrow.There is a fun run,a school fete.and Horse show.Once a year there is a concert in the village hall given by local singers and musicians.We have two sports days,one for playgroup and one for school.The teachers always tell you just to enjoy it if you don't come 1st,2nd,or 3rd,but this year one girl cried because she came last.On Mother's Day we get flowers in church to give to our mums.The Cubs and Scouts have a bonfire on Bonfire night and you can have hot dogs.For the last few years,the village has put on a religious musical in the church around Easter time.Children and grown ups sing and there is a big orchestra and the composer comes to conduct it.The old Doctor always puts the flag up on his flagpole in his garden on special days.
